channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.description:
Report X-2023111020

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0

item.title: Report X-2023110298
item.description:
Report X-2023110298

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-01
  • City: SHREWSBURY
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: DAMAGED THE AIR VALVE, ALL CONTENTS WAS SLOWLY RELEASED CAUSING THE CYLINDER TO BE A NON-PRESSURIZED CONTAINER.

item.title: Report X-2023110453
item.description:
Report X-2023110453

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-06T18:14:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-11
  • City: LYNNFIELD
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE PACKAGE WAS UNLOADED, PALED AND SORTED TO THE SOUTH SORT AISLE. RESPONDER NOTICED A WET SPOT ON THE CORNERS OF THE OUTER PACKAGING. DONED HIS P.P.E. HE THEN, FOLLOWING THE DECISION TREE AND APPROPRIATE RESPONSE SHEET, PLACED THE LEAKING PACKAGE INTO A LINED SPILL TUBE. THE AREA WAS CLEANED FOLLOWING THE EQUIPMENT DECONTAMINATION CHECKLIST. HE THEN BROUGHT THE PACKAGE TO THE DMP AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESS.

item.title: Report X-2023110419
item.description:
Report X-2023110419

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-06T18:14:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-14
  • City: SOMERVILLE
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY EIGHT POUNDS OF DRY ICE COOLING CLINICAL NUTRITION VIAL SAMPLES. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. OUTER BOX HAS PERISHABLE, THIS SIDE UP, AND RUSH PREPRINTED ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 8767X8, SENSORY CLOUD, INC., 50 MILK ST., BOSTON MA 02110.

item.title: Report X-2023110971
item.description:
Report X-2023110971

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-04T15:11:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-13
  • City: WILMINGTON
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered leaking. Placed in a plastic container and taken to fume hood in hazmat cage. DescribePack: Bottom of box soaked, leaking. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in plastic container to prevent spillage of resin.

item.title: Report X-2023110484
item.description:
Report X-2023110484

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-01T18:14:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-02
  • City: BROCKTON
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found improperly loaded on van 420253 by manager. Box was on top shelf on its side resulting in the caps beginning to leak in box. Minimal contents spilled. Manager placed HAZMAT in red bucket and brought it to HAZMAT cage for evaluation. DescribePack: Loose caps on 2 bottles, no dmg to contents. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in red HAZMAT bucket and brought to HAZMAT cage for containment.

item.title: Report X-2023110525
item.description:
Report X-2023110525

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-04T15:11:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-25
  • City: BOYLSTON
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: box found on side. Placed in bucket and taken to Hazmat cage for inspection. DescribePack: side of box wet. Cap knocked off of 1 jug and actively seeping out of the seal DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in bucket upright and taken to Hazmat Cage.
